data.name: Goose vs Zombies
data.detailed_description:
Become the Goose master of acrobatics.
Free your village from the zombie invasion! Hooonk!


Goose capabilities:
Jump, speed up and dodge.
Make sounds to lure zombies into traps that are deadly for them.


Explore the world of floating islands:
Villagers have filled the world with objects to help you fight. Some of them will lower bridges for you, some will launch traps. Make your way from village through different locations to the castle of the main enemy.

Take part in epic battles against the undead to bring peace back to earth. You goose and the fate of the world depends on you. Hooonk!

data.short_description: Wake up, Goose, your village is invaded by zombies. Solve puzzles, open paths for exploration, defeat enemies. Hooonk!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bits or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-10400 or Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-11600K or Ryzen 5 5600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Show violence in graphic nature towards fantasy characters,  non-realistic violence towards human-like characters.
